OrientationInfo 
  public OrientationInfo()

getCelNamed 
  public CostumeSegmentCel getCelNamed(String mood,
                                       String celName)
Returns a cel with the given name for the given mood. If this costume does not explicitly support the given mood, returns the cel with the given name for the default mood, or null if no cel has the given name.
getCels 
  public Vector getCels(String mood)
Returns the vector of cels for the given mood. If this costume does not explicitly support the given mood, returns the vector of cels for the default mood.
See Also:
CostumeSegmentCel
getMoods 
  public Vector getMoods()
Returns the vector of moods defined for this costume segment in this orientation. This will be null for costume segments that use the same art for all moods.
setCels 
  public void setCels(Vector cels,
                      String mood)
Sets the vector of cels for the given mood. If mood is null, sets the single vector of cels used for all moods.
getName 
  public String getName()
setName 
  public void setName(String newName)
classNameToEncode 
  public String classNameToEncode(RtEncoder encoder)
encode 
  public void encode(RtEncoder encoder)
decode 
  public Object decode(RtDecoder decoder)
